mapper.select: SELECT (income.amount - savings_goal.amount - sum(fixed_cost.amount)) FROM account.income INNER JOIN account.savings_goal ON income.user_id = savings_goal.user_id INNER JOIN account.fixed_cost ON income.user_id = fixed_cost.user_id WHERE income.user_id = #{userId.value} GROUP BY income.amount, savings_goal.amount
SELECT balance.id, balance.month, balance.amount FROM account.balance WHERE balance.user_id = #{userId.value}
mapper.update: UPDATE account.balance SET month = #{balanceMonth.value}, amount = #{balanceAmount.value} WHERE user_id = #{userId.value}
